ca.ualberta.persistence
Class SqlPhotoStorage

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.persistence.SqlPhotoStorage

public class SqlPhotoStorage
extends java.lang.Object

Responsible for managing the storage of the skin condition PhotoEntry objects. The data will be extracted from PhotoEntry objects and will be serialized in a row in the appplication's database.

Constructor Detail

SqlPhotoStorage

public SqlPhotoStorage(Context context)
Instantiates a new SqlPhotoStorage with the given context. This constructor helps with dependency injection in unit tests. The AndroidTestCase provides its own context.

Parameters:
context - The parent context.

SqlPhotoStorage

public SqlPhotoStorage()
Instantiates a new SqlPhotoStorage with the application's context. This constructor will probably be used the most.

Method Detail

insertPhotoEntry

public long insertPhotoEntry(PhotoEntry e)
Inserts a new photo into the application's database.

Parameters:
e - The PhotoEntry object to insert.
Returns:
The ID of the new created PhotoEntry in the database.

deletePhotoEntry

public boolean deletePhotoEntry(long id)
Deletes a photo entry from the application database. It also deletes the associated image file.

Parameters:
id - The ID of the photo entry to delete.
Returns:
Returns whether or not the deletion was successful.

deleteAllPhotoEntries

public void deleteAllPhotoEntries()
Deletes all photo entries from the database. This method is mainly used in the tearDown method in a unit test.

getPhotoEntry

public PhotoEntry getPhotoEntry(long id)
Retrieves a photo entry with the specified ID.

Parameters:
id - The ID of the photo to retrieve.
Returns:
A android.database.Cursor containing the single photo entry.

getAllPhotoEntriesWithTag

public java.util.ArrayList<PhotoEntry> getAllPhotoEntriesWithTag(java.lang.String tag)
Retrieves all the photo entries associated with the particular tag. They should be sorted with oldest at index 0.

Parameters:
tag - The tag
Returns:
An ArrayList containing all the photo entries with the given tag.

getAllTags

public java.lang.String[] getAllTags()
Retrieves a list of all skin conditions currently being tracked (i.e. the tags).

Returns:
A list of all the tags in the database.

deleteTagAndPhotoEntries

public boolean deleteTagAndPhotoEntries(java.lang.String tag)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
Deletes the specified tag and all the photo entries associated with the tag. Useful for when the user wants to stop tracking the specified condition.

Parameters:
tag - The tag to be removed.
Returns:
Returns whether or not the operation was successful or not.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getNextAvailableID

public long getNextAvailableID()
Retrieves the next available ID for a PhotoEntry object. If the database is empty (i.e. no PhotoEntry objects are being stored), then the next available ID is 0. The method will retrieve the ID of the last PhotoEntry object, and return that value plus 1.

Returns:
The next available PhotoEntry ID.
